sections.text_plain: DRUG FACTS HPUS Active Ingredients: Silicea 30C, Thuja Occidentalis 12C. The letters HPUS indicate that the components in this product are officially monographed in the Homeopathic Pharmacopoeia of the United States. Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.
sections.text_xhtml:
DRUG FACTS
HPUS Active Ingredients: Silicea 30C, Thuja Occidentalis 12C. The letters HPUS indicate that the components in this product are officially monographed in the Homeopathic Pharmacopoeia of the United States. Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.
sections.title: OTC - ACTIVE INGREDIENT SECTION

sections.text_plain: Indications: Supports the body in coming back to balance after inoculation without removing any benefits.
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Indications:</content> Supports the body in coming back to balance after inoculation without removing any benefits.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.title: INDICATIONS & USAGE SECTION

sections.text_plain: WARNINGS FOR ANIMAL USE ONLY. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. DO NOT USE IF TAMPER EVIDENT NECK SEAL IS BROKEN OR MISSING. Safe use in pregnant animals or animals intended for breeding has not been proven. If animal’s condition worsens or does not improve, discontinue use and consult your veterinarian

sections.text_plain: Directions: Add 4 pumps to a small amount of food twice per day. Not to be used for more than 10 consecutive days. For more information or options to administer refer to our website.

               </text>
